Content: Anyway and very important : all actions needed if there are (that means you have funds on Z addresses) are personal actions : only use your own addresses

Author: Deleted User#0000
Content:
To explain jl post : what it does is simple : 

Create a brand new t address.
Move funds from old z address to the fresh created t address
Create a new z address sapling compatible
Then move coins from this T to the new z sapling compatible address
